newsitem.title: BERMUDA: CRICKET-NZ 132 FOR THREE AT LUNCH VS SRI LANKA.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-NZ 132 FOR THREE AT LUNCH VS SRI LANKA.

text.p: New Zealand continued to build a steady lead over Sri Lanka to be 132 for three at lunch on the third day of the second test on Sunday.
Second innings 132 for three (overnight 53 for one, Young 62, K.Dharmasena 1-25).
Sri Lanka 170 (R.Mahanama 45, H. Davis 5-63, D. Vettori 4-46).
